titleStmt.title: An Advertisement concerning the province of East New-Jersey in America published for the information of such as are desirous to be concerned therein, or, to transport themselves thereto.
titleStmt.author: Perth, James Drummond, Earl of, 1648-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to J.D. Perth.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
